task.contentFilter: The request was blocked by the content filter.
task.disableApplyDiff: If this error keep reoccuring, please disable Editing Through Diffs in Advanced Settings.
task.disableEditFile: If this error keep reoccuring, please disable the Fast Apply experimental feature.

checkpoints.nestedGitRepos: Checkpoints are unavailable, because a nested Git repository was detected at: {{path}}. Please remove or relocate nested Git repositories to use the checkpoints feature or disable checkpoints in the settings to suppress this warning.
checkpoints.protectedPaths: Checkpoints are unavailable in {{workspaceDir}}. Please open a subfolder as workspace to use the checkpoints feature or disable checkpoints in the settings to suppress this warning.

actions.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete {{filename}}?

commitMessage.activated: Maximo Syntax commit message generator activated

errors.invalidResponse: Invalid response format received from extension
errors.missingMessage: No commit message received from extension

error.title: Error
error.workspacePathNotFound: Could not determine workspace path for Git repository

ui.generateButtonTooltip: Generates commit message using AI to analyze your code changes

tooltip.noCredits:
**No credits in your account**

Your Maximo Syntax account has no credits. To use autocomplete, please add credits to your account.

[Open Settings](command:kilo-code.settingsButtonClicked)
tooltip.noUsableProvider:
**No autocomplete model configured**

To enable autocomplete, add a profile with one of these supported providers: {{providers}}.

[Open Settings](command:kilo-code.settingsButtonClicked)
tooltip.completionSummary: Performed {{count}} completions between {{startTime}} and {{endTime}}, for a total cost of {{cost}}.

input.title: Maximo Syntax: Quick Task
input.placeholder: e.g., 'refactor this function to be more efficient'

chatParticipant.name: Agent
chatParticipant.description: I can help you with quick tasks and suggested edits.

incompatibilityExtensionPopup.message: The Maximo Syntax Autocomplete is being blocked by a conflict with GitHub Copilot. To fix this, you must disable Copilot's inline suggestions.

seeNewChanges.title: Showing new changes
seeNewChanges.checkpointsUnavailable: Cannot show new changes, checkpoints are unavailable.
seeNewChanges.noChanges: Cannot show new changes, no changes were found.
seeNewChanges.error: Cannot show new changes, an error occured.

errors.cliOutdated: Your Maximo Syntaxcode CLI version is outdated and doesn't support the Agent Manager. Please update to the latest version.
errors.cliMisconfigured: Maximo Syntaxcode CLI is not configured. Please run 'maximosyntax auth' to sign in or 'maximosyntax config' to configure.

terminal.installMessage: Running npm install to install the Maximo Syntaxcode CLI. Once complete, you can close this terminal and try starting the Agent Manager again.
terminal.authReminder: If this is your first install, run `maximosyntax auth` to sign in before starting the Agent Manager.

terminalCommandGenerator.inputPrompt: Maximo Syntax: Describe the command you want to generate
terminalCommandGenerator.inputPlaceholder: e.g., kill the process running on port 3001, find large files, etc
terminalCommandGenerator.noActiveTerminal: Maximo Syntax: No active terminal found. Please open a terminal first.
terminalCommandGenerator.generationFailed: Maximo Syntax: Failed to generate command: {{error}}

warningDialog.title: Terminal Safety Warning
warningDialog.message: Double-check all generated commands before running them. Terminal actions cannot always be undone— running unverified commands can result in irreversible data loss or system damage. Review and understand the command completely before proceeding!

errors.invalidApiKey: Your OpenAI API key is invalid or does not have access to the Realtime API. Please check your API key and try again.
errors.unknown: Connection failed. Please check your configuration and try again.
